thread.title: Junior Achievement
thread.title_full: Junior Achievement - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Peter A
title: Junior Achievement
text: We were in town for an awards ceremony for the junior achievement organization. I read the biggest complaint is no coffee pot in the room. True, but not enough to give a poor rating. Everything about our stay was comfortable and efficient, from check in to housekeeping to check out. Location and cleanliness were five star.
